title: Looking for Flex players for next Season
body:
Hey Oce gamers i am looking for flex players to go into next season with must be able to play most days and you MUST have (1. A working mic and ALSO have Discord) (2. Be Gold 4 or higher in flex) (3. No rage or Afking) Add me in-game (Mônster) copy paste the name if you cant do the alt code for the o
or add me on discord Josh-#0420 and send me a DM THANKS{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
